General.Name: Zhejiang Yuejian Intelligent Equipment Co Ltd
General.Description: Zhejiang Yuejian Intelligent Equipment Co.,Ltd. designs, develops, produces, and sells textile machinery in China. The company's products include draw texturing machines, rapier looms, towel rapier looms, intelligent cloth inspection machines, warp knitting machines, and air covering machines. It also exports its products to Egypt, Turkey, India, Indonesia, and other countries. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Shaoxing, China.
